seo.title: Blog | Comemos Como Pensamos
seo.description: Discover local food tips, recipes with seasonal products and stories from our producers.
seo.keywords: local food blog, local product recipes, local producers, food sustainability

blog.articleNotFoundDesc: The article you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Comemos Como Pensamos, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part, you should not use our services.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: Comemos Como Pensamos is an e-commerce platform that connects local food producers with consumers across Europe. We facilitate the buying and selling of quality food products.

registration.title: Registration and Accounts
registration.content: To make purchases you must create an account by providing truthful and up-to-date information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.

orders.title: Orders and Purchases
orders.content: When placing an order, you are making a purchase offer that is formalized when the producer confirms availability and order processing. Prices include VAT and are subject to availability.

payments.title: Payments
payments.content: We accept payments via credit/debit card through Stripe, bank transfer, and cash on delivery. All payments are processed securely.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.content: Shipping times and costs vary by producer and location. Each product indicates its estimated delivery time. We are not responsible for delays due to circumstances beyond our control.

returns.title: Returns
returns.content: You have the right to return non-perishable products within 14 days of receipt. Perishable products can only be returned if they arrive in poor condition. Contact support to manage your return.

producers.title: Producers
producers.content: Producers are responsible for the quality and food safety of their products. They must comply with all applicable regulations and keep their information up to date.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We act as intermediaries between producers and consumers. We are not responsible for product quality or indirect damages arising from the use of the platform.

changes.title: Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective upon publication on the platform.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about these terms, you can contact us at info@comemoscomopensamos.es or through our contact page.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Comemos Como Pensamos we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.content: We collect the following types of information:
dataCollected.item3: Payment data: securely processed by Stripe
dataCollected.item4: Browsing data: cookies, visited pages, preferences

usage.title: Use of Data
usage.item3: Improve our services and user experience

sharing.title: Sharing Information
sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We share data only with: producers to process orders, logistics companies for shipping, and payment processors for secure transactions.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration or destruction. We use SSL/TLS encryption for all communications.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:
rights.item4: Object to the processing of your data

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data while you have an active account and for the legally required period for tax and warranty obligations.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: To exercise your rights or resolve privacy questions, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@comemoscomopensamos.es

seo.title: Join as Local Producer | Comemos Como Pensamos
seo.description: Sell your local products online without stall or transport costs. Join our community of producers and reach thousands of customers. 15% commission.
seo.keywords: sell local products, local producer, online market, sell fruits vegetables, farmer sell online, producer platform

hero.title: Sell your products without leaving your farm
hero.subtitle: Join our community of local producers and reach thousands of customers without the costs and time of traditional markets.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: In just 3 steps you'll be selling your products

register.title: Register
register.description: Create your producer account and complete your profile with your business information

approval.title: Approval
approval.description: Our team reviews your profile and welcomes you to the platform

sell.title: Start selling!
sell.description: Upload your products and start receiving orders from customers across the area

benefits.title: Benefits of joining
benefits.subtitle: Everything you need to sell online, hassle-free

noStallFees.title: No stall rental
noStallFees.description: Forget about paying 50-150 for a market stall. Here your shop is always open.

noTransport.title: No transport costs
noTransport.description: No more trips to the market. Customers receive their orders and you stay on your farm.

digitalPresence.title: Digital presence
digitalPresence.description: Your own producer profile with photos, description and all your products.

securePayments.title: Secure payments
securePayments.description: Receive payments securely. We handle the entire process.

orderManagement.title: Order management
orderManagement.description: Simple panel to view and manage all your orders in one place.

salesReports.title: Sales reports
salesReports.description: Access your sales statistics and download reports when you need them.

comparison.title: Platform vs. Traditional market
comparison.subtitle: Compare the costs and benefits of each option

testimonials.title: What our producers say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from producers like you

quotes.testimonial1: Since I joined, I've tripled my sales without having to wake up early for the market. Now I have more time to tend my garden.
quotes.testimonial2: The platform is very easy to use. I upload my products, receive orders and that's it. No complications.
quotes.testimonial3: We reach customers we would never have reached in our village. It's been a total game changer for our business.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started

commission.question: How much commission does the platform charge?
commission.answer: The standard commission is 15% on each sale. If you come referred by another producer, you both enjoy a reduced 10% commission for the first 3 months.

requirements.question: What requirements do I need to sell?
requirements.answer: You need to be a local food producer, have your paperwork in order and be able to manage your product shipments. Our team will guide you through the registration process.

payments.question: How and when do I receive my payments?
payments.answer: Payments are processed weekly. You receive your sales amount (minus commission) directly into your bank account.

shipping.question: How does product shipping work?
shipping.answer: You define your shipping zones and rates. When you receive an order, you prepare the package and ship or deliver it as you've configured.

finalCta.title: Ready to start selling?
finalCta.subtitle: Join today and start reaching new customers tomorrow
finalCta.hint: Registration is free. You only pay commission when you sell.
